16  
17  package org.springframework.cache.config;
18  
19  import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicLong;
20  
21  import org.springframework.cache.annotation.CacheEvict;
22  import org.springframework.cache.annotation.CachePut;
23  import org.springframework.cache.annotation.Cacheable;
24  import org.springframework.cache.annotation.Caching;
25  
26  /**
27   * @author Costin Leau
28   * @author Phillip Webb
29   */
30  @Cacheable("testCache")
31  public class AnnotatedClassCacheableService implements CacheableService<Object> {
32  
33  	private final AtomicLong counter = new AtomicLong();
34  	public static final AtomicLong nullInvocations = new AtomicLong();
35  
36  	@Override
37  	public Object cache(Object arg1) {
38  		return counter.getAndIncrement();
39  	}
40  
41  	@Override
42  	public Object conditional(int field) {
43  		return null;
44  	}
45  
46  	@Override
47  	public Object unless(int arg) {
48  		return arg;
49  	}
50  
51  	@Override
52  	@CacheEvict("testCache")
53  	public void invalidate(Object arg1) {
54  	}
55  
56  	@Override
57  	@CacheEvict("testCache")
58  	public void evictWithException(Object arg1) {
59  		throw new RuntimeException("exception thrown - evict should NOT occur");
60  	}
61  
62  	@Override
63  	@CacheEvict(value = "testCache", allEntries = true)
64  	public void evictAll(Object arg1) {
65  	}
66  
67  	@Override
68  	@CacheEvict(value = "testCache", beforeInvocation = true)
69  	public void evictEarly(Object arg1) {
70  		throw new RuntimeException("exception thrown - evict should still occur");
71  	}
72  
73  	@Override
74  	@CacheEvict(value = "testCache", key = "#p0")
75  	public void evict(Object arg1, Object arg2) {
76  	}
77  
78  	@Override
79  	@CacheEvict(value = "testCache", key = "#p0", beforeInvocation = true)
80  	public void invalidateEarly(Object arg1, Object arg2) {
81  		throw new RuntimeException("exception thrown - evict should still occur");
82  	}
83  
84  	@Override
85  	@Cacheable(value = "testCache", key = "#p0")
86  	public Object key(Object arg1, Object arg2) {
87  		return counter.getAndIncrement();
88  	}
89  
90  	@Override
91  	@Cacheable(value = "testCache")
92  	public Object varArgsKey(Object... args) {
93  		return counter.getAndIncrement();
94  	}
95  
96  	@Override
97  	@Cacheable(value = "testCache", key = "#root.methodName + #root.caches[0].name")
98  	public Object name(Object arg1) {
99  		return counter.getAndIncrement();
100 	}
101 
102 	@Override
103 	@Cacheable(value = "testCache", key = "#root.methodName + #root.method.name + #root.targetClass + #root.target")
104 	public Object rootVars(Object arg1) {
105 		return counter.getAndIncrement();
106 	}
107 
108 	@Override
109 	@Cacheable(value = "testCache", keyGenerator = "customKyeGenerator")
110 	public Object customKeyGenerator(Object arg1) {
111 		return counter.getAndIncrement();
112 	}
113 
114 	@Override
115 	@Cacheable(value = "testCache", keyGenerator = "unknownBeanName")
116 	public Object unknownCustomKeyGenerator(Object arg1) {
117 		return counter.getAndIncrement();
118 	}
119 
120 	@Override
121 	@Cacheable(value = "testCache", cacheManager = "customCacheManager")
122 	public Object customCacheManager(Object arg1) {
123 		return counter.getAndIncrement();
124 	}
125 
126 	@Override
127 	@Cacheable(value = "testCache", cacheManager = "unknownBeanName")
128 	public Object unknownCustomCacheManager(Object arg1) {
129 		return counter.getAndIncrement();
130 	}
131 
132 	@Override
133 	@CachePut("testCache")
134 	public Object update(Object arg1) {
135 		return counter.getAndIncrement();
136 	}
137 
138 	@Override
139 	@CachePut(value = "testCache", condition = "#arg.equals(3)")
140 	public Object conditionalUpdate(Object arg) {
141 		return arg;
142 	}
143 
144 	@Override
145 	public Object nullValue(Object arg1) {
146 		nullInvocations.incrementAndGet();
147 		return null;
148 	}
149 
150 	@Override
151 	public Number nullInvocations() {
152 		return nullInvocations.get();
153 	}
154 
155 	@Override
156 	public Long throwChecked(Object arg1) throws Exception {
157 		throw new UnsupportedOperationException(arg1.toString());
158 	}
159 
160 	@Override
161 	public Long throwUnchecked(Object arg1) {
162 		throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
163 	}
164 
165 	// multi annotations
166 
167 	@Override
168 	@Caching(cacheable = { @Cacheable("primary"), @Cacheable("secondary") })
169 	public Object multiCache(Object arg1) {
170 		return counter.getAndIncrement();
171 	}
172 
173 	@Override
174 	@Caching(evict = { @CacheEvict("primary"), @CacheEvict(value = "secondary", key = "#p0") })
175 	public Object multiEvict(Object arg1) {
176 		return counter.getAndIncrement();
177 	}
178 
179 	@Override
180 	@Caching(cacheable = { @Cacheable(value = "primary", key = "#root.methodName") }, evict = { @CacheEvict("secondary") })
181 	public Object multiCacheAndEvict(Object arg1) {
182 		return counter.getAndIncrement();
183 	}
184 
185 	@Override
186 	@Caching(cacheable = { @Cacheable(value = "primary", condition = "#p0 == 3") }, evict = { @CacheEvict("secondary") })
187 	public Object multiConditionalCacheAndEvict(Object arg1) {
188 		return counter.getAndIncrement();
189 	}
190 
191 	@Override
192 	@Caching(put = { @CachePut("primary"), @CachePut("secondary") })
193 	public Object multiUpdate(Object arg1) {
194 		return arg1;
195 	}
196 
197 	@Override
198 	@CachePut(value="primary", key="#result.id")
199 	public TestEntity putRefersToResult(TestEntity arg1) {
200 		arg1.setId(Long.MIN_VALUE);
201 		return arg1;
202 	}
203 
204 }
Copyright © 2015. All rights reserved.
